Dr. Pascal Blais - Director of Research and Design, iWatchLife

Pascal is a specialist in computer vision and artificial intelligence. Prior to joining iWatchLife he was the VP of Engineering at Visual Cortek, a Canadian high-tech startup. While there, he was responsible for the development team and project management. Pascal used his experience in the field of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Image Processing, Pattern Recognition, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, and Software Engineering to develop Visual Cortek’s technology. Prior to joining Visual Cortek, Pascal taught within his field of programming while working toward his Doctorate in Computer Science from the University of Ottawa. Pascal’s Phd thesis developed a reinforcement learning method that builds a solution space while optimizing its size.
